pages.text:
Frequent Player Discount Card
What is the Frequent Player Discount Card
Discover the best value for your golfing dollar with the Palm Beach County Frequent Player Discount Card. From discounts to advanced booking, this card gives its holder benefits that can be utilized at all five Palm Beach County-owned golf facilities.
Frequent Player Discount Card
What is the Frequent Player Discount Card
Discover the best value for your golfing dollar with the Palm Beach County Frequent Player Discount Card. From discounts to advanced booking, this card gives its holder benefits that can be utilized at all five Palm Beach County-owned golf facilities.

Daily Events
After School Junior Program
CFGA Home-School Program, taught by LPGA Master Professional and First Tee recognized coach Nancy Stuart, is open to any students wanting to learn the game of golf from the very basics to eventually acquiring the skills that allow them to play in competitive golf events while carrying them into High School and College Golf teams!
CLICK HERE FOR MORE INFO
Fitting & Equipment
Come demo the latest clubs from PING, Titleist, Taylormade, Callaway, Cleveland, Srixon, Mizuno, and XXIO any day of the week! Or find a gem in our large trade in club inventory. Want to find equipment that fits your ball flight and swing? Schedule a launch monitor club fitting utilizing FlightScope with one of our Master Club Fitters. Call to book a fitting (561) 629-8723.  TRADE INS WELCOME!
Same Day Re-Gripping is available.
Loft & Lie Machine On Site
Come have your Iron Set, Wedge, and Putter Loft and Lies checked and adjusted on our Tour Standard Mitchell Loft & Lie Machines!   Call 561-629-8723 for Pricing!

John Prince Golf Learning Center
One of the top golf practice facilities in the country, John Prince Golf Learning Center is a state-of-the-art facility with more than 50 grass and mat-hitting stations on its lighted driving range. Ranked one of the top stand-alone driving ranges by the Golf Range Association of America in 2012-2024, the facility also features more than 16,000 square feet of practice putting and chipping greens, while the range has multiple target greens.
Golfers wishing to improve their game can be further challenged at John Prince Golf Learning Center by the facility’s three regulation practice holes. The layout, which features two par threes and a par four, utilizes five tees on each hole, allowing golfers to make the most of all the clubs in their bags during their time on the course.
John Prince Golf Learning Center is staffed by top-ranked LPGA and PGA instructors and provides affordable group and private instruction for all ages and abilities. Custom club fitting, free club rental for juniors, and a fully-stocked golf shop are just some of the amenities offered at the Center.  The combination of services and value makes John Prince Golf Learning Center the premier place for new golfers to acquire knowledge and skill and for accomplished golfers to perfect their game!
John Prince Golf Learning Center, proud to be an Audubon International Cooperative Sanctuary, is open seven days a week, including holidays, from 8:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m (Last Bucket sold at 8:00 PM and 7:30 on clean picks nights). Pull carts are available for use on the course. At the same time, handicap-accessible golf carts are also available with advanced notice.

Staff Bios
Juan Calderon - Golf Learning Center Manager
Juan is home grown here in sunny Florida with roots reaching back to Colombia! At the young age of ten Juan found his new favorite hobby, golf. Just three short years later at the age of thirteen he decided to start volunteering at beautiful Okeeheelee Golf Course. Flash forward nine years at the very same course, Juan met his beautiful wife. At just nineteen years old, Juan started actively instructing as a PGA apprentice which ultimately led to a full-time career with Palm Beach County in 2013. In the past six years Juan has not only graduated from Palm Beach State College with his Associates Degree in Business Management but he has excelled as a golf shop attendant at Park Ridge, a Lead Clerk with John Prince Golf Learning Center where he received the 2017 Rising Star Award, Juan was most recently the Assistant Manager at Okeeheelee.   Juan’s dedication and ambition has truly shined and he is surely excited to see where his talents take him within Palm Beach County. Juan and his wife welcomed a beautiful baby boy Luke in 2017 and baby girl Alura in 2020 and are excited to get a set of clubs in their hands
